Gemini Dragon: "Bring it on."

Gemini Dragon laughed evily as it spun around sending its tail at 
Trainwreck.(Btw omega, Electricity does hurt robots, just letting you 
know...))

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Train Wreck transforms and flips backwards to avoid it.
> 
> Train Wreck: You know, us Radicons also have a gestalt form. And 
there are 7 of us. You don't want to see it, believe me...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 10:12 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   Gemini Dragon just looked down at Trainwreck and smirked before 
it 
>   shot a large amount of liquid nitrogen down onto the trainbot to 
>   freeze it.
> 
>   Gemini Dragon: "All who are a threat to the future will die..."
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > OOC: I didn't know he was a gestalt, pardon me.
>   > 
>   > BIC: Train Wreck was not harmed a all by the electricity, but 
the 
>   fire burst a hole the size of a pie plate in his side.
>   > 
>   > Train Wreck: Okay, explanation on why you are attacking me, 
>   please?...
>   > 
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 10:00 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: Clash
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Gestalts are allowed to be much bigger, Yan said 50 feet was 
the 
>   >   maximum and Gemini Dragon is 45 feet tall. its Gemini 1 and 2 
>   >   combined.
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   >   > OOC: Train Wreck is 16 feet tall, Legendary Nemasis, and 
any 
>   bigger 
>   >   would be breaking the rules...

landed

>   >   >   at him. Gemin Dragon does happen to be a whole helluva 
lot 
>   bigger 
>   >   >   then him so running would be bad...

wrote:
>   >   >   > Train Wreck suddenly zoomed forward, avoiding the 
shots, 
>   his 
>   >   wheels

damaged, 
>   he 
>   >   was 
>   >   >   still moving at some insane speed. Woahh's shots hit him 
in

>   >   rear

zoomed

Rod

down at

wheels 
>   are 
>   >   >   smashed

energy

>   >   the

>   >   >   >   did as well. A second later each head sent out an 
>   energizen 
>   >   beam 
>   >   >   of

blast 
>   of 
>   >   >   >   electricity. Each blast then combined and swirled in 
the 
>   air 
>   >   >   before a 
>   >   >   >   singular massive blast flew straight down at 
Trainwreck. 
>   >   Nearby 
>   >   >   Zero 
>   >   >   >   Reaches methos and glares as he grabs his shoulder 
and 
>   spins 
>   >   him 
>   >   >   >   around to meet his glare.
>   >   >   >

>   >   clash... 
>   >   >   Let's 
>   >   >   >   finish this!"
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   With those words Zero slams his Energy blade into the 
>   blade 
>   >   of 
>   >   >   >   Methos's energy scythe each bot pushing into their 
>   weapons to 
>   >   >   through 
>   >   >   >   the other one off balanca.
